name: Mahjong 9
description:
Mahjong is a free solitaire matching game which uses a set of Mahjong tiles.
The goal of this pyramid game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play.
This board game includes 96 tables. A hint functionality also exist to help you when being stuck on a difficult table.
A refresh functionality is exist to help you refresh Mahjong table
You will be challenged to eliminate all pieces from the Mahjong board.
Mahjong involves skill, strategy, and calculation, as well as a certain degree of luck.

If you enjoy puzzle game, you will surely enjoy playing Mahjong !
